Guru & Siswa SMAN 1 Baubau Terkesan dengan Lomba Cerdas Cermat MPR
03 Nov 2019, 20:45 by Adinda Purnama Rachmani
Jakarta - Guru PPKN SMA Negeri 1 Baubau, Sulawesi Selatan, Siti Sumiwati Rannu mengaku terkesan pada Lomba Cerdas Cermat (LCC) Empat Pilar Majelis MPR 2019. Apa sebabnya?
Pertama menurut Siti adalah metode penyelenggaraan yang baik dengan tata panggung, pencahayaan dan lainnya. Selain itu, ia juga mengaku senang bisa memasuki Gedung Parlemen. Hal tersebut juga dirasakan oleh siswa-siswi yang belum pernah berkunjung ke Ibu Kota.
"Jakarta hanya mereka lihat di televisi dan di buku, begitu terpilih mewakili Provinsi ke Jakarta mereka sangat antusias. Antusias semakin tinggi saat menuju Jakarta dengan menggunakan pesawat terbang. Lalu saat menginjakkan kaki di Jakarta melihat gedung tinggi, merasakan tempat wisata dan permainan, serta berkenalan dengan teman baru dari berbagai daerah. Intinya, mereka sangat senang sekali tidak terbayangkan," ucap Siti Sumiwati, Minggu (3/11/2019).
Selain itu Siti mengatakan bahwa kehadiran sekolahnya dalam ajang LCC ini menjadi berkah tersendiri untuk dirinya dan para siswa-siswi.
"Berkah buat kami kembali mengikuti LCC nasional di 2019, setelah sebelumnya pada 2015 pernah ikut juga tapi tidak sampai final. Nah, pada tahun inilah kami berjuang lebih keras. Berkah lainnya yaitu, ketika kami di Jakarta banyak sekali hal-hal baru yang kami dapati di Jakarta, yang belum pernah kami temui di daerah seperti mode pendidikan, pengetahuan dan lain-lain," ucap Siti Sumiwati.
Namun sayangnya, ada satu momen emosional yang dibeberkan Siti, yaitu saat mendapat kabar bahwa ibunya meninggal dunia tepat sehari saat dirinya sedang di Jakarta.
"Saya sedih sekali, tapi melihat antusias dan gembiranya para siswa mendapat kehormatan sampai ke Jakarta berlaga di kompetisi bergengsi serta bersemangat untuk merebut posisi terhormat juara satu nasional. Membuat saya sangat terharu dan tetap berada di Jakarta menemani mereka selain memang sudah tugas saya dampingi mereka, setelah saya jelaskan dengan keluarga di sana," tambahnya.
Namun sayangnya, tim SMA Negeri 1 Baubau tidak berhasil menang dan harus berhenti di babak penyisihan. Tapi Siti menegaskan hal tersebut bukan menjadi persoalan, sebab segala kemampuan dari peserta sudah dikerahkan.
"Saya tekankan ke anak-anak juga yang penting adalah pengalaman, sebab pengalaman tidak bisa dibeli tapi sebuah kesempatan banyak pengalaman luar biasa yang mereka peroleh, antara lain menginjakan kaki di Jakarta terutama di Gedung Parlemen, lalu beradu kemampuan dengan anak-anak pintar pilihan dari semua provinsi di Indonesia. Dengan pengalaman itu, kualitas mental dan intelektualitas mereka akan semakin berkembang," tutupnya.

Teachers & Students of SMAN 1 Baubau Impressed by the MPR Quiz Competition
03 Nov 2019, 20:45 by Adinda Purnama Rachmani
Jakarta - Siti Sumiwati Rannu, a PPKN High School 1 Baubau teacher, South Sulawesi, said she was impressed at the Four Pillars of the MPR Assembly 2019. What is the reason?
First, according to Siti, is a good method of organizing the stage, lighting and others. In addition, he also claimed to be happy to enter the Parliament Building. This was also felt by students who had never been to the Capital City.
"Jakarta they only see on television and in books, once elected to represent the Province of Jakarta they are very enthusiastic. The enthusiasm is higher when they go to Jakarta by plane. Then when they set foot in Jakarta to see tall buildings, feel tourist attractions and games, and get acquainted with new friends from various regions. Basically, they are very happy to be unimaginable, "said Siti Sumiwati, Sunday (3/11/2019).
In addition, Siti said that the presence of her school in the LCC event was a blessing for herself and her students.
"Blessings for us returned to the national LCC in 2019, after previously in 2015 we also participated but not until the final. Well, this year we fought harder. Another blessing is, when we were in Jakarta, a lot of new things that we found in Jakarta, which we have never met in areas such as education, knowledge and other modes, "said Siti Sumiwati.
But unfortunately, there was an emotional moment that was revealed by Siti, namely when she got the news that her mother had died exactly one day while she was in Jakarta.
"I am very sad, but seeing the enthusiasm and excitement of the students had the honor of getting to Jakarta competing in prestigious competitions and eager to win the honored position of national champion. Makes me very touched and remain in Jakarta to accompany them besides it is my duty to accompany them, after I explain with the family there, "he added.
But unfortunately, the Baubau High School 1 team did not win and had to stop in the preliminary round. But Siti emphasized that this was not a problem, because all the abilities of the participants had been mobilized.
"I emphasize to the children that what is important is experience, because experience cannot be bought but it is an opportunity that many extraordinary experiences they have received, including setting foot in Jakarta especially in the Parliament Building, and then competing abilities with selected smart children from "all the provinces in Indonesia. With that experience, their mental and intellectual qualities will further develop," he concluded.
